content: corn dog pattern crochet pattern by @maplewallcrafts please do not copy distribute upload make publicly available resell or exchange my pattern feel free to sell finished products you make from this pattern provided they are made by you be sure to credit me as the designer when posting the finished product info page supplies needed/used ● bernet velvet yarns and or red heart super saver yarn- colors yellow and green can use other yarn brands ● yarnneedle ● scissors ● polyester stuffing/fiberfill ● stichmarker ● safety eyes ● hook size - 4 5mm 3 75mm for smaller yarn abbreviations ● magic_ring - magic_ring ● chain - chain ● st - stitch ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● increase - increase ● decrease - decrease ● round - round ● bobble - bobble stitch - 6 unfinished double crochets into the bobble pattern start ears x2 in yellow round 1 chain 7 round 2 in 2nd chain from the hook 6sc chain 1 turn 6 round 3 6sc chain 1 turn 6 round 4 decrease 2sc decrease chain 1 turn 4 round 5 4sc chain 1 turn 4 round 6 2dec chain 1 turn 2 fasten_off leaves x2 in green round 1 chain 11 round 2 in 2nd chain from the hook 10sc chain 1 turn 10 round 3 10sc chain 1 turn 10 round 4 decrease 6sc decrease chain 1 turn 8 round 5 8sc chain 1 turn 8 round 6 8sc chain 1 turn 8 round 7 decrease 4sc decrease chain 1 turn 6 round 8 6sc chain 1 turn 6 round 9 decrease 2sc decrease chain 1 turn 4 round 10 2dec 2 fasten_off head and body in yellow round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 6inc 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 round 4 2sc increase x6 24 round 5 3sc increase x6 30 round 6 3sc 6 with ears 10sc 6 with ears 5sc 30 round 7-10 30sc 4 rounds 30 round 11 14sc bobble single_crochet bobble 13sc 30 round 12 30sc 30 add safety eyes between row 8-9 4 st s apart in green round 13 2sc 10sc with leaf 8sc 10sc with leaf 30 round 14-24 30sc 11 rounds 30 round 25 3sc decrease x6 24 round 26 2sc decrease x6 18 round 27 single_crochet decrease x6 12 round 28 6dec 6 fasten_off sew hole closed
